meanings.definition: The short, fine, soft hair of certain animals.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit's fur was white and fluffy.
meanings.sent2: She wore a coat made of luxurious fur.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur seemed to sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The fur of the bear was as dark as the night.
meanings.sent5: The fur of the puppy was so soft that it felt like a cloud.
